PROJECT.NAME: xgSipPect3
PROJECT.TITLE: Siphonaria pectinata, genome assembly, xgSipPect3.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Siphonaria pectinata. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
